statements: DELETE FROM gaming_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM gaming_reviews WHERE review_id = 101 AND reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE user_id = '98765432-dc2b-12d9-8102-121876541238' AND rating_value < 3;

DELETE FROM ratings
WHERE rating_value = 1 AND accessory_id = '671271b2-4cf8-4fe2-b7d0-6a9cb78d18c2';

DELETE FROM reviews
WHERE review_rating = 5 AND user_id = '83d10ab3-a7b1-4d29-b5a4-46fa9ca9fb0f';
DELETE FROM accessories WHERE accessory_name = 'Headphones' AND accessory_type = 'Bluetooth';
